CFS Checksum Configuration Parameters

CFS Checksum Commands CFS Checksum Telemetry CFS Checksum Table Definitions

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the CFS Checksum Application either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Global CS_CHILD_TASK_DELAY
Delay between checksumming cycles for child task

Global CS_CHILD_TASK_PRIORITY
CS Child Task Priority

Global CS_DEFAULT_BYTES_PER_CYCLE
Default number of bytes to checksum per cycle

Global CS_MAX_NUM_APP_TABLE_ENTRIES
Maximum number of applications to checksum

Global CS_MAX_NUM_EEPROM_TABLE_ENTRIES
Maximum number of entries in the Eeprom table to checksum

Global CS_MAX_NUM_MEMORY_TABLE_ENTRIES
Maximum number of entries in the Memory table to checksum

Global CS_MAX_NUM_TABLES_TABLE_ENTRIES
Maximum number of tables to checksum

Global CS_MISSION_REV
Mission specific version number for CS application

Global CS_STARTUP_TIMEOUT
Timeout for waiting for other apps to start

Global CS_DEFAULT_ALGORITHM
default CRC algorithm
